title: Net magnetic field at origin from four wires

content.question: Four long, straight wires are perpendicular to the xy-plane. Each wire is the same distance from the origin O, as shown in the figure above. The wires have equal currents that are in the directions shown. Which of the following best represents the direction of the net magnetic field, if any, at the origin due to the four currents?

choices.label: The figure shows an arrow pointing straight up.
The figure shows an arrow pointing horizontally to the right.
The figure shows an arrow pointing straight down.
The figure shows an arrow pointing horizontally to the left.
Undefined because the net field is zero.

content.answer: The figure shows an arrow pointing horizontally to the left.
